languages.text: "Гипотеза — данное примитивное сообщество составлено из потомков техноматов низшего сословия, обслуживавших данную палубу. Название "акобы" является производным от категории Ак-Об. "Ак" — категория аколитов, обслуживающих основные палубы, "Об" — разряд, отличающий служителей общего обслуживания от специализированных".

"Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."
languages.original_text: "Гипотеза — данное примитивное сообщество составлено из потомков техноматов низшего сословия, обслуживавших данную палубу. Название "акобы" является производным от категории Ак-Об. "Ак" — категория аколитов, обслуживающих основные палубы, "Об" — разряд, отличающий служителей общего обслуживания от специализированных".

'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, who serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned duties of general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「仮説：この原始的共同体は、かつてこの甲板で業務に従事していた下級テクノマットの子孫で構成されている。『アクジェン』という名はカテゴリーAc-Genに由来する。『Ac』はアコライトカテゴリ、すなわちメインデッキでの仕事を意味する。『Gen』は一般職に割り当てられたスタッフを意味し、専門的なものではなく、特にメンテナンスに従事している」
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: 「仮説：この原始的共同体は、かつてこの甲板で業務に従事していた下級テクノマットの子孫で構成されている。『アクジェン』という名はカテゴリーAc-Genに由来する。『Ac』はアコライトカテゴリ、すなわちメインデッキでの仕事を意味する。『Gen』は一般職に割り当てられたスタッフを意味し、専門的なものではなく、特にメンテナンスに従事している」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “假设：这个原始社区由低级技工的后代组成，他们的祖先曾在这个甲板上服务。‘通侍’这个名字，源于原本人员分类的阶层。‘侍’代表为主甲板服务的侍仆，‘通’指的是那些服务人员被分配到一般通用岗位，并非专业维护岗位。”
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: “假设：这个原始社区由低级技工的后代组成，他们的祖先曾在这个甲板上服务。‘通侍’这个名字，源于原本人员分类的阶层。‘侍’代表为主甲板服务的侍仆，‘通’指的是那些服务人员被分配到一般通用岗位，并非专业维护岗位。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Hypothèse : cette communauté primitive est constituée de descendants de technomates de rang inférieur qui servaient sur ce pont. Le nom "Acgen" est dérivé de la catégorie Ac-Gen : "Ac" désigne la catégorie Acolyte, qui officiait sur les ponts principaux, et "Gen" le personnel assigné aux tâches de maintenance générales. »
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: « Hypothèse : cette communauté primitive est constituée de descendants de technomates de rang inférieur qui servaient sur ce pont. Le nom "Acgen" est dérivé de la catégorie Ac-Gen : "Ac" désigne la catégorie Acolyte, qui officiait sur les ponts principaux, et "Gen" le personnel assigné aux tâches de maintenance générales. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Hipótesis: esta comunidad primitiva la forman descendientes de tecnómatas de bajo rango que trabajaban en esta cubierta. El nombre "Acgen" deriva de la categoría Ac-Gen. "Ac" es la categoría Acólito, que servía en las cubiertas principales y "Gen" se refiere al personal de servicio al que asignaron tareas de mantenimiento generales, en lugar de especiales».
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: «Hipótesis: esta comunidad primitiva la forman descendientes de tecnómatas de bajo rango que trabajaban en esta cubierta. El nombre "Acgen" deriva de la categoría Ac-Gen. "Ac" es la categoría Acólito, que servía en las cubiertas principales y "Gen" se refiere al personal de servicio al que asignaron tareas de mantenimiento generales, en lugar de especiales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hypothese: Diese primitive Gemeinschaft besteht aus Nachfahren niederer Technomaten, die einst auf diesem Deck gedient haben. Der Name 'Akgen' leitet sich von der Kategorie Ak-Gen ab. 'Ak' stand für die Kategorie der Akolythen, die für die Hauptdecks zuständig waren. 'Gen' bezog sich auf Dienstpersonal, das generelle Wartungsaufgaben erfüllte, keine spezialisierten Aufgaben."
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: "Hypothese: Diese primitive Gemeinschaft besteht aus Nachfahren niederer Technomaten, die einst auf diesem Deck gedient haben. Der Name 'Akgen' leitet sich von der Kategorie Ak-Gen ab. 'Ak' stand für die Kategorie der Akolythen, die für die Hauptdecks zuständig waren. 'Gen' bezog sich auf Dienstpersonal, das generelle Wartungsaufgaben erfüllte, keine spezialisierten Aufgaben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hipotez: Bu ilkel topluluk; bir zamanlar bu güvertede hizmet vermiş, düşük rütbeli teknomatların torunlarından oluşuyor. 'Hagen' ismi, Ha-Gen Kagetorisi'nden devşirme. 'Ha', ana güvertelerde hizmet veren Havari kategorisi için kullanılıyordu. 'Gen' ile de belli bir uzmanlığı olmayan ve bakım görevine verilmeyen, genel göreve atanmış hizmet personeli kastediliyordu."
languages.original_text: "Hypothesis: this primitive community is made up of descendants of low-ranking technomats who once serviced this deck. The name 'Acgen' derives from Category Ac-Gen. 'Ac' stood for the Acolyte category, which serviced the main decks. 'Gen' referred to service staff who were assigned general, as opposed to specialised, maintenance duties."

traits.locale_text: "Hipotez: Bu ilkel topluluk, bir zamanlar bu güvertede hizmet vermiş düşük rütbe teknomatların torunlarından oluşma. 'Hagen' ismi Ha-Gen Kagetorisi'nden devşirme. 'Ha', ana güvertelerde hizmet veren Havari kategorisi için kullanılıyordu. 'Gen' ile de belli bir uzmanlığı olmayan ve bakım görevine verilmeyen, genel göreve atanmış hizmet personeli kastediliyordu."
